name: Sharon Laflamme
seeking: Wellness practitioners and spiritual teachers for serenity-focused transformation programs. Podcast collaborations and joint workshops integrating fitness, mental health, and spirituality.

offering: Health and wellness coaching for sustainable lifestyle transformation.
business_focus: Create serenity through integrated fitness, mental health, spirituality, and natural wellness coaching.
